com.dt.dtpt.service.publicwx

接口 PublicwxService


  • @Service
 @Path(value="/publicwx")
public interface PublicwxService
    当前生产服务器IP:120.76.152.25 当前生产服务器端口(PORT):8888 当前测试服务器IP:120.76.152.25 当前测试服务器端口(PORT):7888
    作者:
    Administrator

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      com.dt.dtpt.util.Result attentionPublic(com.dt.dtpt.mybatis.model.publicwx.WxUserPublic wxUserPublic, java.lang.String shId)
      用户关注公众号
      runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}/attentionPublic,post对象：WxUserPublic
      example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a/attentionPublic,postdata:{...}
      java.lang.String getAccessToken(java.lang.String shId)
      获取商户的access_token
      runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}/getAccessToken
      example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a/getAccessToken
      java.lang.String getJsapiTicket(java.lang.String shId)
      获取商户的jsapi_ticket
      runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}/getJsapiTicket
      example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a/getJsapiTicket
      com.dt.dtpt.mybatis.model.publicwx.WxPublic getWxPublicByShid(java.lang.String shId)
      根据商户编号获取公众号信息
      runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}
      example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a
      com.dt.dtpt.util.Result isManerger(java.lang.String userOpenID, java.lang.String shId)
      判断用户是否为商户管理员
      runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}/isManerger/{userOpenID}
      example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a/isManerger/oUDNMwBwAOoiYp0JrqHOx6BFiupo
      void loadAccessToken()
      加载所有商户的全局access_token，面向任务
      runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/loadAccessToken
      example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/loadAccessToken 当token不存在或者有效时间低于20分钟时，重新加载token
      void loadJsapiTicket()
      加载所有商户的jsapi_ticket，面向任务
      runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/loadJsapiTicket
      example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/loadJsapiTicket 当ticket不存在或者有效时间低于20分钟时，重新加载ticket
      com.dt.dtpt.mybatis.model.publicwx.WxPayConfig payInfo(java.lang.String shId)
      获取商户微信支付配置信息
      runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}/payInfo
      example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a/payInfo
      java.lang.String reLoadAccessToken(java.lang.String shId)
      重新加载指定商户的access_token 当token不存在或者有效时间低于20分钟时，重新加载token
      runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}/reLoadAccessToken
      example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a/reLoadAccessToken
      java.lang.String reLoadJsapiTicket(java.lang.String shId)
      重新加载指定商户的jsapi_ticket 当ticket不存在或者有效时间低于20分钟时，重新加载ticket
      runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}/reLoadJsapiTicket
      example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a/reLoadJsapiTicket

      • loadAccessToken

        @Path(value="/loadAccessToken")
void loadAccessToken()
        加载所有商户的全局access_token，面向任务
        runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/loadAccessToken
        example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/loadAccessToken 当token不存在或者有效时间低于20分钟时，重新加载token

      • loadJsapiTicket

        @Path(value="/loadJsapiTicket")
void loadJsapiTicket()
        加载所有商户的jsapi_ticket，面向任务
        runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/loadJsapiTicket
        example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/loadJsapiTicket 当ticket不存在或者有效时间低于20分钟时，重新加载ticket

        @Path(value="/{shId}/reLoadAccessToken")
java.lang.String reLoadAccessToken(java.lang.String shId)
        重新加载指定商户的access_token 当token不存在或者有效时间低于20分钟时，重新加载token
        runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}/reLoadAccessToken
        example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a/reLoadAccessToken
        参数:
        shId - 商户编号
        返回:

      • getWxPublicByShid

        @Path(value="/{shId}")
com.dt.dtpt.mybatis.model.publicwx.WxPublic getWxPublicByShid(java.lang.String shId)
        根据商户编号获取公众号信息
        runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}
        example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a
        参数:
        shId - 商户的用户编号，不能为空
        返回:
        返回WxPublic对象

      • isManerger

        @Path(value="/{shId}/isManerger/{userOpenID}")
com.dt.dtpt.util.Result isManerger(java.lang.String userOpenID,
                                                                                   java.lang.String shId)
        判断用户是否为商户管理员
        runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}/isManerger/{userOpenID}
        example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a/isManerger/oUDNMwBwAOoiYp0JrqHOx6BFiupo
        参数:
        userOpenID - 用户微信OPENID，不能为空
        shId - 商户的用户编号，不能为空
        返回:
        是则返回对象的success属性值为true,否则为false

      • attentionPublic

        @Path(value="/{shId}/attentionPublic")
 @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED)
com.dt.dtpt.util.Result attentionPublic(com.dt.dtpt.mybatis.model.publicwx.WxUserPublic wxUserPublic,
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String shId)
        用户关注公众号
        runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}/attentionPublic,post对象：WxUserPublic
        example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a/attentionPublic,postdata:{...}
        参数:
        wxUserPublic - 微信用户对象,微信OPENID不能为空，希望微信UnionID能不为空
        shId - 商户编号
        返回:
        记录成功，返回对象的success属性为true,否则为false

      • payInfo

        @Path(value="/{shId}/payInfo")
com.dt.dtpt.mybatis.model.publicwx.WxPayConfig payInfo(java.lang.String shId)
        获取商户微信支付配置信息
        runAdress:http://{IP}:{PORT}/services/publicwx/{shId}/payInfo
        example:http://120.76.152.25:7888/services/publicwx/9055be7a45a5425da1c44b2e2126411a/payInfo
        返回:
        返回商户支付配置信息
